title: Himi 401
lyrics:
8.7.8.7.loua
(“Tau ō ki Kilikali, ‘o toe fakapapau
‘a e pule’anga.” I Samiuela 11:14)
1.
Tau ō ā ki Kilikali
‘O tau fakamanatua,
‘Etau hao mei he kovi
‘I he ʻofa ‘a e ‘Otua.
‘I he ‘ao ‘o e maka
Na’a tau omi ‘i he a’a,
Ke tau toe fuakava,
Ke tau toe tukupā.
2.
Tau ō ā ki Kilikali,
‘O tau fakamanatua
‘Etau fua keli kolo,
‘I he tau ma ‘a e ‘Otua.
Tokosi’i ‘a e fili ‘eni,
Kuo meimei tō kotoa.
‘Oua te tau loto fo’i
Ka tau fakato’oto’a.
3.
Tau ō ā ki Kilikali,
‘O tau fakamanatua
Hotau ohi ‘e he ‘Eiki;
Mole ‘etau anga mu’a;
‘Ene fakamolemole
Hi
a
‘o ‘etau talavou.
Ke tau toe fuakava,
Tau kamata pē fo’ou.
4.
Tau ō ā ki Kilikali,
‘O tau fakamanatua
Ki he’etau fu
a
kamata
Ki he me’akai he fonua
Kuo ngalo ‘ene vovo?
Na’a tau fiungofua ai?
‘Oua te tau sio kehe,
Ka tau tau’olunga’ak
i
.
5.
Tau ō ā ki Kilikali,
‘O tau fakamanatua
Ki he’etau fuakava
Ke tau tauhi ‘a e ‘Otua.
Hotau tu’i pē ‘a Sīsū
Ke tau toe fakahā:
Ke tau toe fuakava;
Ke tau toe tukupā. *
